segments.text: I have a little problem with room 507 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Problems are what we're here for , sir . Please tell me your problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This room is filthy with cockroaches .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Were you wearing your glasses when you noticed them , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've already seen nine of them and , as they say , eight is enough !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , sometimes a fast elevator ride makes our guests see spots .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are not in a position to question my vision or my statement !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm very sorry , sir . Will you please hold while I transfer you to my supervisor ?
segments.speaker: S2
